resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/104752</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>104752</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206839</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Invention at Play</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Erfindung am Spiel</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Invention au jeu</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Invenção no jogo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Invenzione a gioco</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εφεύρεση στο παιχνίδι</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Invención en el juego</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">examines how play -- the ordinary work of childhood -- connects with the creative impulse. Read about inventors of the ski, sailboard, surgical robot, unfolding structures, water purifier, barbed wire, Velcro, Kevlar, post-it note, microwave, high-efficiency wind turbine, and telephone.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">überprüft, wie Spiel -- die gewöhnliche Arbeit 
der Kindheit -- an den kreativen Antrieb anschließt. Gelesen 
über Erfinder des Skis, des sailboard, des chirurgischen Roboters, 
der Ausbreitenstrukturen, des Wasserreinigungsapparats, des 
Stacheldrahts, des Flausches, des Kevlar, Pfosten-es Anmerkung, 
Mikrowelle, high-efficiency Windturbine und Telefon.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">examine comment le jeu -- le travail ordinaire de 
l'enfance -- se relie à l'impulsion créatrice. Eu connaissance
des inventeurs du ski, du sailboard, du robot chirurgical, des 
structures de dévoilement, de l'épurateur de l'eau, du barbelé, du 
Velcro, du Kevlar, de poteau-lui note, micro-onde, turbine à haute 
efficacité de vent, et téléphone.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">examina como o jogo -- o trabalho ordinário da 
infância -- conecta com o impulso creativo. Lido sobre 
inventores do esqui, do sailboard, do robô cirúrgico, das estruturas
unfolding, do purifier da água, do arame farpado, do velcro, do 
Kevlar, do borne-ele nota, microonda, turbina high-efficiency do 
vento, e telefone.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">esamina come il gioco -- il lavoro ordinario 
dell'infanzia -- collega con l'impulso creativo. Letto sugli 
inventori del pattino, del sailboard, del robot chirurgico, delle 
strutture spiegare, del depuratore di acqua, del filo spinato, del 
velcro, del Kevlar, dell'alberino-esso nota, microonda, turbina 
high-efficiency del vento e telefono.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">εξετάζει πώς το παιχνίδι -- η συνηθισμένη εργασία της
παιδικής ηλικίας -- συνδέει με τη δημιουργική ώθηση. 
Διαβάστε για τους εφευρέτες του σκι, sailboard, του 
χειρουργικού ρομπότ, των ξετυλίγοντας δομών, του εξαγνιστή 
ύδατος, του οδοντωτού καλωδίου, Velcro, Kevlar, post-it 
της σημείωσης, του μικροκύματος, του υψηλής απόδοσης 
ανεμοστροβίλου, και του τηλεφώνου.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">examina cómo el juego -- el trabajo ordinario de 
la niñez -- conecta con el impulso creativo. Leído sobre los 
inventores del esquí, del sailboard, de la robusteza quirúrgica, de 
las estructuras del despliegue, del purificador del agua, del alambre 
de púas, del velcro, del Kevlar, del poste-él nota, microonda, 
turbina high-efficiency del viento, y teléfono.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206839</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>104752</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/invention-at-play</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
